success_criteria: Linting passes; Unit test coverage >= 85% (backend), >= 90% (critical logic); No new Critical/High vulnerabilities from SAST/SCA scans.
measurement_frequency: On every push to a PR branch.
business_impact: Prevents low-quality code and known vulnerabilities from entering the main branch.

success_criteria: All backend integration tests pass; Full E2E regression suite passes with >= 98% success rate; DAST scan completes with no new critical vulnerabilities.
failure_action: Block deployment to `staging`; alert on-call developer.
tools_used: GitHub Actions, Supertest, Cypress, OWASP ZAP
escalation_procedure: Tech lead investigates failure and coordinates fix.
business_impact: Ensures the `staging` environment is stable and reflects a release candidate.

success_criteria: All staging gates passed; Manual QA sign-off on exploratory testing and critical user flows; Performance benchmarks on `staging` meet NFRs; Manual approval from Product Owner.
responsible_team: Product Owner, Tech Lead, QA Lead
tools_used: GitHub Actions (manual approval step), k6, Manual Test Case Management Tool
business_impact: Final sign-off to ensure business and quality objectives are met before user impact.
